1010210.name: The Crown of Leaves - Official Soundtrack
1010210.description:
Chapter 1:

  • Friends Of The Deceased Moon
  • Inevitable Changes (Bo version)
  • Inevitable Changes (Flynn version)
  • Rise Your Hands And Clap Three Times
  • Smoke and Wine
  • The Bad News
  • The Cliff
  • The Crown of Leaves Waltz
  • The Greenhouse
  • The Hill Camp
  • The Old Manor
  • The Party Murder
  • The Storyteller

Chapter 1, DLC: Immortal Horses:

  • The Lost Man
  • The Hero Of The Lake

Chapter 2 (Act I & Act II):

  • Empty World
  • Bird Cage
  • Ink and The Fire
  • The Hill Camp Morning
  • The Hill Camp Morning (Festival on The Cemetery)
  • Salesaly
  • Magician’s Assistant
  • It’s Showtime! (Fairytail)
  • It’s Showtime!


♦ All music is created by _Blacksmith_, except for "The Hill Camp," created by Craig S.Barnes.
♦ You will find the OST in the game folder:
(eg.[…]\Steam\steamapps\common\The Crown of Leaves\The Crown of Leaves OST)
1010210.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
